tool_description: Say hello to your visitors in their native language!
name: HelloSalut
title: HelloSalut

api_list.name: HelloSalut

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (note, currently supported only cs, de, en-gb, en-us, es, fr, is, ja and sk)

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Use built in IP and language detection
